SELECT bc.category_num, bc.category_name, COUNT(*) AS category_cnt FROM book_categorys bc INNER JOIN books b ON bc.category_name = b.book_category WHERE 1 = 1
and REPLACE(LOWER(b.book_name), ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(LOWER(#{word}), ' ', '') || '%'
and REPLACE(LOWER(b.book_author), ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(LOWER(#{word}), ' ', '') || '%'
and REPLACE(LOWER(b.book_publisher), ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(LOWER(#{word}), ' ', '') || '%'
GROUP BY bc.category_num, bc.category_name ORDER BY bc.category_name ASC
